title: MALWARE CORPORATION
subtitle: This adapter serves as the hub for the entire malware forum ecosystem
footer: 2025 MALWARE CORPORATION | LINKS TO THE PROJECT IN THE TELEGRAM ECOSYSTEM
aboutText:
We are a closed project for developers, researchers, and specialists working with malware, exploits, info-stealers, drainers, fake platforms, bots, and anonymous schemes.
Our tools and code are regularly used in private and commercial setups worldwide.

Malware Corp is not just a project. It's a tool. It's a network. It's a system.
Join while you still can.

items.title: Malware Corporation
items.description:
A public gateway into the world of advanced malware development and cyber tooling.

Here you'll find:
• Insights into stealers, RATs, clippers, and more
• Source leaks, builder breakdowns, and tool showcases
• Research-driven content on exploits, distribution, and persistence
• Educational drops for red teamers and cybersecurity pros

Follow to stay connected with the pulse of the underground.

items.title: Crack Cloud
items.description:
Unlock a curated stream of cracked tools, source leaks, and security resources.

Inside:
• Black Hat & White Hat utilities
• Scanners, inviters, spammers, checkers
• Reverse engineering & pentesting guides
• And more for your offensive security toolkit

Stay updated — stay ahead.

items.title: Ransomware Team
items.description:
A curated space for professionals researching and developing ransomware technologies.

Inside you'll find:
• Builders & source codes for Windows and cross-platform ransomware
• Cracked & custom ransomware variants with updates
• Pentesting guides focused on Windows vulnerability exploitation
• Distribution tactics, private builds, and exclusive tools
• And more resources tailored to the ransomware domain

Subscribe to explore the depths of offensive security.
